input.sentences: we visited the wedding venue today | before the big day !
there is a beautiful mansion on the grounds .
there was an otter family in the waters nearby .
we went down to the beach below and checked it out .
output.sentences: The couple visited this venue to see if it was the right fit for their wedding.
They love this one, and both thought that the mansion and its grounds were beautiful.
In addition, the view of the bay was awesome!
As they walked around, they found there was even a family of otters in the water nearby!
The last place the looked was the beach, which was also great.
